Comment: The IRS has been left in shambles by Trump and Musk. So much so that it's estimated they will [not be able to collect up to $500 billion in tax revenue](https://fortune.com/2025/03/24/irs-tax-revenue-500-billion-cash-x-date-debt-ceiling-default-deadline/) because of these cuts. So basically Americans save a few million on Doge cuts but lose half a trillion in revenue. This is sensible?
Author: biscuitarse
